technology: There were no technical difficulties experienced by the participant.
cur_neg_affect: The participant expresses some negative affect about the pandemic, mentioning the need to wear a mask on public transit.
past_neg_affect: The participant describes a difficult time during the pandemic when they were living in Ecuador and had limited access to resources and were unable to leave their apartment for three months.
communal_orientation: The participant engages in conversation and shares their experiences, but doesn't go out of their way to build off of the conversation partner's story.
engagement: The participant is engaged in the conversation and shares their experiences, but doesn't ask many questions of their partner.
defensiveness: The participant does not display any defensive behaviors.
vaccine_importance: The participant has a graduate education in public health and is very pro-vaccine.
booster_importance: The participant does not explicitly state their belief about the importance of boosters.
cognitive_complexity: The participant demonstrates a moderate amount of cognitive complexity by considering the pros and cons of getting the booster and weighing the risks and benefits.
general_notes: The participant is a public health professional and is very pro-vaccine.
